scripts.deploy:gh: npm install gh-pages && CONF='gh-config.toml' && REPO=$(git config --get remote.origin.url | sed 's/https/http/g' | sed 's/http:\/\/github.com\///g') && REPOUSER=$(echo $REPO | awk -F '/' '{print $1}') && REPONAME=$(echo $REPO | awk -F '/' '{print $2}') && URL=https://$REPOUSER.github.io/$REPONAME/ && echo baseurl = \'$URL\' > $CONF.tmp.1 && sed '/baseurl/d' config.toml > $CONF.tmp.2 && cat $CONF.tmp.1 $CONF.tmp.2 > $CONF && rm -f $CONF.tmp.1 $CONF.tmp.2 && hugo --config=$CONF && node -e "require('gh-pages').publish('public', console.error.bind(console));"
scripts.deploy:
npm install ftpsync && CONF='ftp-config.json' && [ ! -e $CONF ] && echo -n "Error! You must create $CONF file first\n\nTIP: Copy script below to create $CONF file\n\necho '{\n  \"host\": \"ftp.example.com\",
  \"port\": 21,
  \"remote\": \"/www\",
  \"user\": \"*****\",
  \"pass\": \"*****\"
}' > $CONF
" && exit 1 || hugo && node -e "var ftp = require('ftpsync/lib/ftpsync'), conf = require('./$CONF'); for (var i in conf) { ftp.settings[i] = conf[i]; } ftp.settings.local = 'public'; ftp.log.verbose = true; ftp.run();"
